properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated November 8, [1933], on stationery from the Manila Hotel; includes description of dinner party for Dr. [Jacob Gould] Schurman, opinions on independence for the Philippines and Filipino people; update on delays in the negotiations with the Philippine legislature and Governor General Murpht for air franchises for Pan American Airways; mentions [Stokely W.] Morgan.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
